title: *NICE 2BEDROOM 2BATH *GREAT VIEW*MAYFIELD HTS*ASK ABOUT SPECIALS!*
map_address: 6807 Mayfield Rd near SOM Center Rd
posting_body: Nestled in a beautiful setting overlooking the Chagrin Valley, Gates Mills Place is a beautiful and unique apartment community near Cleveland.
Extensive upgrades have been made to all lobbies, welcome centers, and suites.
Our common areas are all newly renovated and have all new lighting as well.
You will enjoy garage and carport parking, sparkling indoor and outdoor pools, six fitness centers, libraries, and the on-site conveniences of a beauty salon, convenience store, and coffee shop.
We also offer online rental payment and maintenance requests.
You have shopped for the best and now you have found it at the all new Gates Mills Place! Visit us today and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for... and more!
*Must Have good credit, criminal & rental history
Call us today to see your new home at
Full Service Business Centers: Computers, Internet Access, Fax and Copy Machines
Customer Service Centers in Each Building
All New Common Area Renovations Including Carpeting and Lighting
Free Wi-Fi in Lobby Common Areas
Close to Local Freeways: I-271, I-480, I-90
Walk to Banks, Shopping, Retail and Restaurants
Online Rental Payment and Maintenance Requests
Preferred Employer Program and Senior Discount Available
